variable.name: subjid
variable.description: De-identified subject ID

variable.name: centre
variable.description: Centre the subject was recruited to

variable.name: country_of_residence
variable.description: Country of residence

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender

variable.name: ageofonset
variable.description: Age of onset of melanoma

variable.name: arm_mole2_5mm
variable.description: Number of nevi on the arms that are greater than 2mm and less than 5mm (nurse exam)

variable.name: arm_mole_ge5
variable.description: Number of nevi on the arms that are 5mm or larger (nurse exam)

variable.name: total_moles_on_arms
variable.description: Number of nevi on the arms that are greater than 2mm (nurse exam)

variable.name: mole2_5mm
variable.description: Number of nevi on the face, neck, arms, hands, chest, abdomen, back, buttocks, legs, feet (includes soles of feet), scalp that are greater than 2mm and less than 5mm (nurse exam)

variable.name: mole_ge5
variable.description: Number of nevi on the face, neck, arms, hands, chest, abdomen, back, buttocks, legs, feet (includes soles of feet), scalp that are 5mm or larger (nurse exam)

variable.name: totalnevuscount
variable.description: Number of atypical nevi and nevi (greater than 2mm) on the face, neck, arms, hands, chest, abdomen, back, buttocks, legs, feet (includes soles of feet), scalp (nurse exam)

variable.name: moleatyp
variable.description: Number of atypical nevi on the face, neck, arms, hands, chest, abdomen, back, buttocks, legs, feet (includes soles of feet), scalp (nurse exam)

variable.name: ctbq1
variable.description: How many freckles would you have had on your face at the end of summer during childhood (self report)

variable.name: ctbq2
variable.description: How many freckles would you have had on your face at the end of summer as an adult (self report)

variable.name: ctbq3
variable.description: Which one of these descriptions best describes how moley your whole body is (self report)

variable.name: ctbq4
variable.description: How many moles altogether are on your back from the base of your neck to the top of your underpants (self report)

variable.name: cteq10aface
variable.description: What percentage of the face has freckles (nurse exam)

variable.name: cteq10aarms
variable.description: What percentage of the arms have freckles (nurse exam)

variable.name: cteq10ashoulders
variable.description: What percentage of the shoulders have freckles (nurse exam)

variable.name: ctcqb1
variable.description: Which color best describes your natural hair color at the age of 18 years (self report)

variable.name: ctcqb2
variable.description: Which color best describes the color of your eyes (self report)

variable.name: ctcqb3
variable.description: Which color type best describes your skin before tanning or on areas never exposed to the sun, such as the inside of your upper arm (self report)

variable.name: ctcqb4
variable.description: Which statement best describes what would happen if your skin were exposed to bright sunlight for the first time in summer for one hour in the middle of the day without any protection (self report)

variable.name: ctcqb5
variable.description: Which of the following best describes what would happen to your skin if it were repeatedly exposed to bright sunlight in summer without any protection (self report)

variable.name: ctcqb6
variable.description: In general, how does your skin react to the sun (self report)

variable.name: ability_to_tan
variable.description: How easily do you tan?

variable.name: beardcolour
variable.description: For men only, if you grow a beard, what color is it?

variable.name: frecklesage15
variable.description: Did you have freckles at Age 15 years?

variable.name: frecklescurrent
variable.description: Do you currently have or get freckles?

variable.name: frecklesallyear
variable.description: Do you have freckles all year round?

variable.name: molesonarms
variable.description: Please hold your forearm at a comfortable distance from your face (e.g. at the same distance that you would hold a reading book) and count the number of easily visible dark spots or patches (moles) on all sides of your forearms

variable.name: molesremoved
variable.description: Have you had any moles removed in the past?

variable.name: countmolesremoved
variable.description: For people who have had moles removed in the past, how many moles have you had removed

variable.name: sunburned
variable.description: Before you were diagnosed as having melanoma, had you ever been sunburnt?

variable.name: sunburnseverelt20
variable.description: Number of incidences of severe sunburn at Age less than 20 years

variable.name: sunburnseverege20
variable.description: Number of incidences of severe sunburn at Age greater than or equal to 20 years

variable.name: sunburnnotseverelt20
variable.description: Number of incidences of non-severe sunburn at Age less than 20 years

variable.name: sunburnnotseverege20
variable.description: Number of incidences of non-severe sunburn at Age greater than or equal to 20 years

variable.name: sunhrssummerweekdays
variable.description: Number of hours normally spent outdoors in the summer on weekdays

variable.name: sunhrssummerweekends
variable.description: Number of hours normally spent outdoors in the summer at weekends

variable.name: sunhrswinterweekdays
variable.description: Number of hours normally spent outdoors in the winter on weekdays

variable.name: sunhrswinterweekends
variable.description: Number of hours normally spent outdoors in the winter on weekends

variable.name: livedinhotclimate
variable.description: Before you were diagnosed as having melanoma, had you lived for more than 2 months in a country with weather that is hotter than summer in the UK?

variable.name: monthsinhotclimate
variable.description: Total number of months lived in a country that is hotter than summer in the UK

variable.name: holshotclimatelt20
variable.description: Did you have any holidays in a hot climate before you were 20 years old? Do not count holidays taken while living in a hot climate

variable.name: countholshotclimatelt20
variable.description: For people who had holidays in a hot climate before the Age of 20 years, how many holidays did you have?

variable.name: hotclimatelast5yrs
variable.description: Before you were diagnosed as having melanoma, had you been to any hot climates in the last 5 years? Do not include periods while living in a hot climate

variable.name: wkshotclimatelast5yrs
variable.description: For people who had been to any hot climates in the last 5 years, number of weeks in total
